data.name: [City of God I:Prison Empire]-Original Sound Track
data.detailed_description:
This is the City of God I:Prison Empire original soundtrack, including 18 original soundtrack.


All of these songs will appear in the "City of God: Prison Empire - Original SoundTrack" in the root directory of your game.

1 Images (1992) [Main Menu] 04:07

2 Images with VOX (1992) [LP in Game] 04:08

3 Man in the House of Cards (1995) [Ending] 03:53

4 Angel [LP in Game] 05:14

5 Shopper Rap (1990) [LP in Game] 02:55

6 What's Left (1994) [LP in Game] 04:09

7 Irretraceable Way [Trailer BGM] 02:22

8 Superme (1991) [LP in Game] 03:11

9 Lazzy Afternoon (1991) [LP in Game] 02:19

10 Genoa Square [LP in Game] 02:43

11 Heart Of Steel (1991) [LP in Game] 03:27

12 Gate of Mose [LP in Game] 02:24

13 Royal Salute [LP in Game] 04:16

14 Time Traveler (2040) [LP in Game] 03:17

15 Weve Come A Long Way (2040) [LP in Game] 04:12

16 Perfect Sunset (1997) [LP in Game] 03:49

17 The End (1997) [LP in Game] 04:03

18 The Beginning (1998) [LP in Game] 03:34

fullgame.name: City of God I - Prison Empire

data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Xp，Vista，7
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Graphics: 128 MB 显存，能够运行 Shader Model 1.1
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win7,Win8,Win10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Graphics: 256 MB 显存，能够运行 Shader Model 2.0+
